description: This tender is open to TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders who qualified under Tier 1 for services in National Capital Region.
full_summary:
================================ِّ

**Appian Platform Database Tender**
------------------------------------

**Reference Number**: cb-9390-18315870
**Amendment Number**: 5
**Solicitation Number**: T8080-230183

**Publication Date**: September 22, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: October 12, 2023, at 2:00 PM local time
**Amendment Date**: October 12, 2023
**Expected Contract Start Date**: November 7, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date**: November 6, 2024

**Tender Status**: Expired

**Description**
---------------

This notice is to invite eligible stakeholders to tender for the provision of Intelligent Automation (IA) services on the Appian platform. Transport Canada (TC), through the Service & Digital Branch, seeks to establish an on-demand vehicle for IA practitioners who are well-versed in business process management (BPM), robotic process automation (RPA), and low-code application development.

**Background**
-------------

TC promotes a safe, secure, efficient, and environmentally responsible transportation system. The Enterprise Solutions Directorate (ESD) provides intelligent automation solutions in support of program delivery, backoffice administration, and legacy systems modernization. This procurement aims to address the need for skilled IA resources who can assist in these efforts on-demand, as TC continues to modernize its digital infrastructure.

**Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria**
--------------------------------------

Only TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders who qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region are eligible to submit a bid in response to this procurement. Evaluation will be based on the price of the proposed services.

**Contracting Entity Information**
--------------------------------

Transport Canada
330 Sparks St.
Ottawa, ON K1A 0N5
Canada

**Contact Information**
----------------------

Tony Youness
Transport Canada
(343) 550-2603
tony.youness@tc.gc.ca

**Notice and Attachments**
-------------------------

Please see the attached document for more information. [1] [2]

[1] Amendment 1 (English)

[2] Amendment 1 (French)

Note that the original text contained a lot of irrelevant content that has been removed for the sake of brevity. The rewritten entry only includes the necessary information to accurately convey the tender announcement to interested parties.
